sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis on Friday touted his state's recent ban on what he calls "Zuckerbucks," referring to money that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg donated to local elections departments ahead of the 2020 election.
author: Xander Landen
title: What Are 'Zuckerbucks'? DeSantis Touts Ban in Election Enforcement
